title: Apple cake with mango and honey yoghurt sauce
ingredients: ['4 to 6 Bramley apples', '1 lemon, juiced', '50g plain flour', '25g caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger or cinnamon', '275ml skimmed milk', '2 lemons, zested', '1 mango', '8 tablespoons natural yoghurt or soy yoghurt', '1 teaspoon Honey']
